## Effortlessly save and organize your web links in Obsidian.

### LinkStowr is a free, open source and privacy-friendly set of tools designed to make it extremely easy to capture and store your valuable online resources in a structured and meaningful way.

[Sign Up](https://linkstowr.com/signup)

![Screenshot of the LinkStowr Chrome extension for saving a link](../03%20-%20MEDIA%20&%20FILES/c2f8210046c1ce910f888fd689c93018_MD5.png)

Use the Chrome extension to save a link along with a helpful note. LinkStowr will only store the links until they get synced to Obsidian.

[[data:image/png;base64,|![Chrome icon]]Download LinkStowr](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/linkstowr/aabkobajeambdejghgegicnhcndhcjpk)

Use the Obsidian plugin to sync to your vault. Once the sync is complete, LinkStowr will clear all the links ensuring that your vault is the only long term home for your links!
> linkstowr,obsidian,bookmarks,links,open source
